about_the_game:
This DLC includes super sexy breaking “Hot Break costumes” from Naya, Claire and Helena.
When the character's HP becomes ‘Dying’ State, part of the costume is destroyed.
Includes [100 Trophy] where you can purchase gears immediately.
- You must have the latest update installed before using this content.
